content:
Brandon Harris is the starting quarterback for Saturdays matchup against McNeese State University saidLSU football coach Les Miles during a Monday afternoon news conference PERIOD

Until Monday Miles had yet to announce his starter PERIOD Harris and quarterback Anthony Jennings were both pinned for the role PERIOD

This summer Anthony Jennings was suspended from the team six weeks after he was arrested PERIOD Jennings charges were drop a few weeks before preseason camp and he returned with the team but Harris still pulled ahead PERIOD

Follow The Daily Reveille for updates to this story PERIOD

title: LSU football coach Les Miles names Brandon Harris as the starting quarterback against McNeese | Daily | lsureveille.com
